Hanbali_Fiqh.Basmalah: bismillahi ar-raḥma̅n ar-raḥi̅m allahumma ṣalli 'ala̅ muḥammad wa'ala̅ a̅lihi wa ṣaḥbihi wa sallim

Description.Descrip: Water as it was created is ritually purifying. Pure water, on the other hand, has been changed by mixing with a soluble, pure substance (eg, milk). It is neither ritually purifying nor removes filth.

Nonsolubles.Descrip: Mixing with non-solubles (eg, grease) or sea salt, yet remains ritually purifying.

Stolen_Water.Descrip: Using water stolen or traded for something forbidden. It is neither ritually purifying nor removes filth.

Filthy_Water.Descrip: Using filthy water. This type of water is changed by filth not located in the place being purified or has in a small quantity encountered filth. A small quantity is less than 162 liters.

Gold_and_Silver.Descrip: Using containers made of or soldered with gold or silver.

Some_Silver.Descrip: Using containers with a small amount of silver solder when needed.

Unslaughtered_Animals.Descrip: Using the skin and parts of an unslaughtered animal. They are filthy and do not become pure via tanning.

Hair_etc.Descrip: Using hair and the like (eg, feathers).

Cleaning_with_Water.Descrip: Cleaning with water [istinja̅'] is obligatory (Q) for anything that exits, from urine to worms, except flatulence and whatever does not defile.

Seeking_Protection.Descrip: Saying upon entering: bismillahi ar-raḥma̅n ar-raḥi̅m allahumma inni̅ a'u̅dhu bika mina al-khubthi wa al-khaba̅'ith.

Wiping_Three_Times.Descrip: Wiping member base to tip three times and tapping three times.

Stones.Descrip: Cleaning with stones and the like [istijma̅r] (given that the filth does not move beyond the typical area and there are at least three clean wipes) and then with water.

Seeking_Forgiveness.Descrip: Saying upon exiting: ghufra̅nak al-ḥamdulilla̅hi alladhi adhhaba 'anni̅ al-adha̅ wa 'a̅fa̅ni̅

Only_Water.Descrip: Cleaning only with water or only with stones and the like (Q), but water is superior.

Allahs_Name.Descrip: Entering with anything bearing Allah's name.

Lifting_Garment_Early.Descrip: Lifting garment before getting close to the ground.

Touching_Member.Descrip: Touching member with right hand without need.

Paths.Descrip: Using paths, congregation places, and the like.

Prayer_Direction.Descrip: Facing or turning one's back from the direction of prayer [qiblah].

In_Buildings.Descrip: Doing so in or between buildings.

Cleaning_with_Dung_etc.Descrip: Cleaning with dung, bones, food, anything with sanctity, or a part of an animal while it is attached to the animal.

Other_Than_Pure_Neutral_etc_Object.Descrip: Cleaning with other than an item that is pure, neutral, dry, and capable of cleaning the area.

Rightside.Descrip: Beginning with the rightside for actions.

Toothstick.Descrip: Using the toothstick [sawwa̅k] at all times, especially for prayer.

Fasting_After_Noon.Descrip: Not using it after noon [ẓuhr] prayer for one fasting.

Kohl.Descrip: Applying kohl three times to the eyes.

Removing_Hair.Descrip: Removing pubic hair and plucking armpit hair.

Piercing_Boys.Descrip: Piercing the ears of a young boy.

Circumcising_Early.Descrip: Circumcising between birth and the seventh day.

Forgetting.Descrip: Forgetting or being ignorant of the fact, then obligation is lifted.

Face_Mouth_and_Nostrils.Descrip: Washing the face and rinsing the mouth and nostrils.

Entire_Head.Descrip: Wiping the entire head, including the ears.

Mouth_Then_Nostrils.Descrip: Rinsing the mouth before the nostrils, vigorously if not fasting.

Fingers_Betwen_Digits.Descrip: Running fingers between fingers and toes.

Three_Times.Descrip: Washing a second and third time.

Supplication.Descrip: Looking to the sky and saying: ashhadu an la ilaha illa Allahu wahdahu la sharika lahu, wa ashhadu anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa rasuluhu, Allahumma j'alni mina at-tawwabin wa j'alni mina al-mutatahhirin, subhanaka Allahumma wa bi hamdika, ashhadu an la ilaha illa anta, astaghfiruka wa atubu ilayk [ED: Do transliteration]

Four_Times.Descrip: Washing more than a third time.

Forgetting.Descrip: Forgetting or being ignorant of the fact, then obligation is lifted.
Forgetting or being ignorant of the fact, then obligation is lifted.

Description.Descrip: Deliberately, voluntarily, and remembering the fast, it is broken by the following. The day must be made up.

Inserting_into_Body.Descrip: Inserting anything into the body or body cavity, from any place.

Water_Reaching_Throat.Descrip: Having water reach the throat when washing mouth or nostrils.

Overwhelming_Need_for_Sex.Descrip: Having an overwhelming need for coitus and the like.

Freeing_a_Slave.Descrip: Concerning coitus during a Ramadhan fast, freeing a slave. Or else, fasting consecutively for two months. Or else, giving food to 60 poor. Else, the obligation is removed.

Female_with_Excuse.Descrip: Being female with an excuse of sleeping or being compelled, forgetful, or ignorant.

Swallowing_Mucus.Descrip: Swallowing mucus that entered the mouth.

Ejaculating_from_Touching.Descrip: Ejaculating or releasing pre-ejaculate [madhi̅] from masturbation or non-genital rubbing.

Cupping.Descrip: Being cupped by or cupping someone.

Description.Descrip: One ṣa̅' [Ed: a volume unit of three liters] per person of dried dates, raisins, wheat, barley, porridge, flour, or cottage cheese, or any stored grain.

Having_Excess.Descrip: Having excess of necessary expenses for day and night of Eid al-Fitr.

For_Those_Under_Care.Descrip: Paying it for himself and Muslims under his responsibility.

Upon_Sunset.Descrip: Paying it becomes obligatory at sunset of night of Eid.

Making_Up_Alms.Descrip: Making up the alms if he has missed the time.

For_Unborn_Child.Descrip: Paying it for an unborn child.

On_Eid.Descrip: Paying it on Eid before the Eid prayer.

Two_Days_Prior.Descrip: Paying up to two days prior to Eid.

Individual_to_Group.Descrip: Giving it as an individual to a group, and vice versa.

After_Eid_Prayer.Descrip: Paying it on Eid after the Eid prayer.

All_Recipient_Categories.Descrip: Paying it evenly to all of the following eight recipient categories: (1) needy, (2) poor, (3) alms workers, (4) leaders whose hearts are being softened, (5) slaves, (6) debtors, (7) those fighting in the path of Allah, and (8) wayfarers.

Relatives.Descrip: Paying alms to relatives not under one's responsibility.

One_Recipient_Category.Descrip: Paying only to one of the eight categories of recipients.

Transporting_Alms.Descrip: Transporting alms beyond distance for shortening prayers, if eligible people are present. (Alms are taken from where the wealth source is located.)

Alms_alFitrah.Descrip: For alms al-Fitr, taking from wealth at the givers' location.

Other_Than_Eligible_Recipients.Descrip: Using alms for other than charity to the eight recipient categories.

To_Bani_Hashim_Nonmuslims_etc.Descrip: Paying it to Bani̅ Ha̅shim and their freed slaves, an ancestor or descendent, a slave (Q), or a non-Muslim. (Q)
